scripts.build: sass --style=expanded --load-path=node_modules/nhsuk-frontend/src/nhsuk style.scss style.css | sass --load-path=node_modules/nhsuk-frontend/src/nhsuk style-gutenburg.scss style-gutenburg.css | sass page-colours.scss page-colours.css | cp ./node_modules/nhsuk-frontend/dist/nhsuk/nhsuk-frontend.min.js js/nhsuk.min.js
scripts.compress: sass --style=compressed --load-path=node_modules/nhsuk-frontend/src/nhsuk style.scss style.min.css | sass --style=compressed --load-path=node_modules/nhsuk-frontend/src/nhsuk page-colours.scss page-colours.min.css
scripts.zip: zip -r nightingale.zip ./ -x .git .gitignore *.git/* /critical-css-generator.js /postcss.config.js *.github/* /Dockerfile /gruntfile.js /package.json package-lock.json *.DS_Store .DS_Store node_modules/ /phpcs.xml.dist node_modules/**\* nhsblocks/node_modules/**\*
